name: Kinnara
description: The Kinnara is a medium-sized celestial creature radiating goodness and law, known for its strong ties to protective spirits.
memorable: It can enhance weapon attacks with radiant damage and possesses an innate loyalty to its partner, making it a formidable ally.
goals: To protect its partner and ensure the safety of others while combating evil.
relations: Kinnara can be encountered alongside other celestial beings or allies who uphold law and goodness.
environment: Typically found in places of virtue or areas under celestial conflict.
strengths: Resistant to radiant damage and most physical damage from non-magical attacks, immune to being charmed or frightened.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to spells and effects targeting celestial beings.
attacks: Can use both melee and ranged attacks, dealing dual damage types with its shortsword and shortbow.
most_powerful_ability: Discordant Refrain can frighten and deal psychic damage to multiple enemies while providing a unique auditory threat.
equipment: Shortsword and shortbow for both melee and ranged engagements.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 13, allowing it to detect ambushes and hidden threats effectively.
skills: Excels in insight and performance skills, reflecting its high Wisdom and Charisma.
additional_information: Can innately cast multiple spells without material components.
Interior bond ensures it remains loyal to its partner.
Magical weapon attacks deal additional radiant damage.
Can teleport to its partner to share damage from attacks.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with abilities including healing and charm effects.
test_queries: flying celestial creature with innate spells
